channels.summary: Light activity focused on a newly created SEO freelancer dashboard built in Notion, plus a humorous aside about misreading a job title.

highlights.title: SEO Freelancer Notion Dashboard
highlights.details: A custom Notion dashboard created for managing SEO freelance work. Shared as a personal setup; no public template link provided, but indicates interest in workflow tooling for SEO freelancers.

channels.summary: Announcements around a GEO visibility playbook, community onboarding expectations, and a light joke.

highlights.title: GEO brand visibility playbook & Spotlight automation
highlights.details: Michael announces a proven playbook for taking a brand from 0% to 20% visibility in 2 weeks, based on analysis of millions of prompt responses across 1000+ brands. The session will cover how to execute this using free tools and how the Spotlight tool can automate the workflow. Access is via a Google Forms signup.

channels.summary: Ongoing discussion on best practices for AI-generated ad videos, including preferred video models, clip length strategies, and perceived production costs vs. ad pricing.

highlights.title: Best-practice workflow for AI-generated ad videos
highlights.details: Discussion emphasizes that high-quality AI video ads are typically composed of multiple 6â€“8 second clips stitched together, because longer single generations degrade quality. This workflow is recommended for creating polished ads from current video models.

highlights.title: Comparison of video generation models: wan 2.6, VEO, Sora
highlights.details: Participants compare leading video models for ad creation. notanewplayer recommends using the latest VEO, Sora, or wan models, with a strong personal preference for wan (specifically wan 2.6) as best-in-class for producing realistic ad-style videos.

highlights.title: Cost and pricing of AI-generated ads
highlights.details: The group debates the incremental time and money cost of producing high-quality AI video ads. One view is that the extra cost is minimal (estimated at $5â€“$10 more) relative to the value, suggesting such ads should be priced at $200+ even at the low end.
